attributes.action: Public Vote of Confidence on Norfolk County Council
attributes.additional_details:
Following the terrible fiasco with a local proposed Incinerator that has now been rejected, and the very real likelihood of extra savage cuts affecting local services, whilst £30 million pounds has to pay the firm concerned 'compensation', we demand that the people who pay taxes to Norfolk County Council be given a Referendum - a Vote of Confidence in that council.
If the Vote of Confidence goes against that council - all elected officials should stand down, and fresh elections held. Such a result would be a clear indication that voters are fed up with the way elected officials are blatantly misusing our funds, and spending our money in ways they'd never spend their own!
